tool.name: feature
tool.command:
chakin feature load_featureprops '$tab_file' '$analysis_id' '$organism_id' '$prop_type'
#if $feature_type: --feature_type '$feature_type' #end if #if $match_on_name: $match_on_name #end if
| jq -S . > $results

param.name: tab_file
param.label: Tab File
param.help: Path to the tabular file file to load

param.name: prop_type
param.label: Prop Type
param.help: Type of the feature property (cvterm will be created if it doesn't exist)

param.name: feature_type
param.label: Feature Type
param.help: Type of the target features in sequence ontology (will speed up loading if specified)

param.name: match_on_name
param.label: Match On Name
param.help: Match features using their name instead of their uniquename

tool.help:
Load feature properties from a tabular file (Column1: feature name or uniquename, Column2: property value)
@HELP@
